abilities.name: Adaptive Evolution
abilities.effect: This Pokémon can evolve during your first turn or the turn you play it.

abilities.name: Adaptive Evolution
abilities.effect: This Pokémon can evolve during your first turn or the turn you play it.

attacks.name: Harden
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, if this Pokémon would be damaged by an attack, prevent that attack's damage done to this Pokémon if that damage is 60 or less.

attacks.name: Quiver Dance
attacks.effect: Search your deck for a basic Energy card and attach it to this Pokémon. Shuffle your deck afterward. If you attached Energy in this way, heal 40 damage from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Call for Family
attacks.effect: Search your deck for a Basic Pokémon and put it onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.

abilities.name: Leaf Draw
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may discard a Grass Energy card from your hand. If you do, draw 3 cards.

attacks.name: Deranged Dance
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 damage times the number of Benched Pokémon (both yours and your opponent's).

attacks.name: Sleep Powder
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Whiplash
attacks.effect: Flip a coin until you get tails. For each heads, discard an Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Mega Drain
attacks.effect: Heal 20 damage from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Exciting Shake
attacks.effect: During your next turn, flip 6 coins instead of 2 for this Pokémon's Prickly Needles attack.

attacks.name: Prickly Needles
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Stoke
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for up to 3 basic Energy cards and attach them to this Pokémon. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.effect: Discard an Energy attached to this Pokémon.

abilities.name: Counterattack Quills

attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.
